mapper.sql: goodsno, goodsname, price, goodsunit, goodsexp, goodsex, supplierno, image
mapper.insert: insert into product (goodsno, goodsname, price, goodsunit, goodsexp, goodsex, supplierno, image) values (#{goodsno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{goodsunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsexp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into product
goodsno,
goodsname,
price,
goodsunit,
goodsexp,
goodsex,
supplierno,
image,

mapper.update:
update product
goodsname = #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
goodsunit = #{goodsunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goodsexp = #{goodsexp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goodsex = #{goodsex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplierno = #{supplierno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where goodsno = #{goodsno,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update product set goodsname = #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, goodsunit = #{goodsunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goodsexp = #{goodsexp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goodsex = #{goodsex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplierno = #{supplierno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where goodsno = #{goodsno,jdbcType=INTEGER}
